scripts.build: npm run buildmono && npm run buildamis
scripts.buildmono: cd src/mono && dotnet publish -c Release -p:PublishSingleFile=true --runtime linux-x64 && cd ../..
scripts.buildamis: cd src/amis && dotnet publish -c Release -p:PublishSingleFile=true --runtime linux-x64 && cd ../..
scripts.clear: rm -rf src/node_modules && rm -rf cdk/cdk.out && rm -rf cdk/node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -f client/stack-data.json
scripts.all: npm run init && npm run build && npm run deploy && npm run demo && npm run destroy && npm run clear
